#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() 
{
    int te=0,t;
    cin>>t;
    do
    {
        char A[500];
        cin>>A;
        int l=strlen(A),i,flag=0;
        for (i=0;i<l && flag==0;i++)
        {
            switch(A[i])
            {
                case 'a': case 'e': case 'i': case 'o': case 'u':
                case 'A': case 'E': case 'I': case 'O': case 'U': flag++;
            }
        }
        if (flag==0) cout<<"no"<<endl;
        else cout<<"yes"<<endl;
        te++;
    }
    while(te<t);
	return 0;
}
